net.sf.JRecord.External

Class CopybookLoaderFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.JRecord.External.CopybookLoaderFactory

  • public class CopybookLoaderFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Generate a copybook loader based on the loader id (index) supplied by the calling program. It will also provide a Copybook loader name if required

    Examples of use: 

           LayoutDetail layout = CopybookLoaderFactory.getInstance().getLayoutRecordEditXml(copybookName, null);

       CopybookLoader loader = CopybookLoaderFactory.getInstance()
              .getLoader(CopybookLoaderFactory.RECORD_EDITOR_XML_LOADER);
       LayoutDetail layout = loader.loadCopyBook(copybookName, 0, 0, "", 0, 0, null).asLayoutDetail();

    If you are using Cobol look at 

          CobolIOProvider.newIOBuilder(..) methods
    Author:
    Bruce Martin

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CopybookLoaderFactory.NoCb2xml
      This is a dummy class to be used if cb2xml is nt present It simply gives an error message if used.

        public CopybookLoader getLoader(int loaderId)
                         throws java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                                java.lang.InstantiationException

               CopybookLoader loader = CopybookLoaderFactory.getInstance()
              .getLoader(CopybookLoaderFactory.RECORD_EDITOR_XML_LOADER);
       LayoutDetail layout = loader.loadCopyBook(copybookName, 0, 0, "", 0, 0, null).asLayoutDetail();

        If you are using Cobol look at 

              CobolIOProvider.newIOBuilder(..) methods
        Parameters:

        requested loader
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - error
        java.lang.InstantiationException - error

      • getLayout

        public final LayoutDetail getLayout(int loaderId,
                     java.lang.String copyBookFile,
                     int splitCopybookOption,
                     java.lang.String font,
                     int binFormat,
                     AbsSSLogger log)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
        Get a RecordLayout from an external File
        Parameters:
        loaderId - External Layout format
        copyBookFile - File holding the External Layout
        splitCopybookOption - How to split the copybook (Cobol / Cb2Xml)
        font - Font name
        binFormat - Binary format
        log - Where to write any errors
        Returns:
        The Record Layout
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Any error that occurs reading the copybook
